commit.message:
Rollup merge of #65914 - estebank:type-alias-bounds-sugg, r=davidtwco

Use structured suggestion for unnecessary bounds in type aliases

Rollup merge of #65914 - estebank:type-alias-bounds-sugg, r=davidtwco

Use structured suggestion for unnecessary bounds in type aliases
